data.title: AutoPkg: using the Jamf Pro API and AWS
data.meta_description: Develop, build, test and sign Apple apps using Amazon EC2 Mac instances.
data.text: This JNUC session featured Rich Trouton, IT technology senior consultant at SAP. He explained the significance of Amazon Web Services and how they make it possible to use AutoPkg, a tool used to automate macOS software packaging and distribution, in the cloud. This software solution allows IT admins to develop, build, test and sign Apple apps using Amazon EC2 Mac instances, powering efficient patch management workflows. Trouton provides details on how the process works and how the IT team at SAP gets the most mileage out of it.
